mapper.sql: CD001, CD002, CD003, CD004, SG001, CL001, CD007, SD001, CD009, CD010, CD011, CD012, CD013, CD014, CD015,image_id, active_name,active_type,area,geometry,center,position,region
CD002, CD003, CD004, SG001, CL001, CD007, SD001, CD009, CD010, CD011, CD012, CD013, CD014, CD015,image_id, active_name,active_type,area,geometry,center,position,region

ck3.CK002, ck3.CD004, ck3.SG001, ck3.CK005, ck3.CK006, ck3.CK007, ck3.CK008, ck3.CK009, ck3.CK010, ck3.CK011, ck3.CK012, ck3.CK013, ck3.CK014, ck3.CK015, ck3.CK016, ck3.CK017, ck3.CK018, ck3.CK019, ck3.CK020, ck3.CK021, ck3.CK022, ck3.CK023, ck3.CK024, ck3.CK025, ck3.CK026, ck3.CK027, ck3.CK028, ck3.CK029, ck3.CK030, ck3.CK031, ck3.CK032, ck3.CK033, ck3.CK034, ck3.CK035, ck3.CK036, ck3.CK037, ck3.CK038, ck3.CK039, ck3.CK040, ck3.CK041, ck3.CK042, ck3.CK043, ck3.CK044, ck3.CK045, ck3.CK046, ck3.CK047, ck3.CK048, ck3.CK049, ck3.CK050, ck3.CK051, ck3.CK052, ck3.CK053, ck3.CK054, ck3.CK055, ck3.CK056, ck3.CK057, ck3.CK058, ck3.CK059, ck3.CK060, ck3.CK061, ck3.CK062, ck3.CK063, ck3.CK064, ck3.CK065, ck3.CK066, ck3.CK067, ck3.CK068, ck3.CK069, ck3.CK070, ck3.CK071, ck3.CK072, ck3.CC002, ck3.CK074, ck3.CK075, ck3.CK076, ck3.CK077, ck3.CK078, ck3.CK079, ck3.CK080, ck3.CK081, ck3.CK082, ck3.CK083, ck3.CK084, ck3.CK085, ck3.CK086, ck3.CK087, ck3.CK088, ck3.CK089, ck3.CK090, ck3.CK091
mapper.select:
select cd.active_name aname,img.name oldType ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(CK016,"-",-1) nowType,cd.cd001,cd.active_name nname ,geometry from st4_scs_cd cd inner join rlhd_group co on co.id=cd.group_id inner join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001) ck on ck.CD004 = cd.CD001 left join image_config img on img.id=cd.active_type where 1=1
and co.id=#{id}

SELECT name,orign,IFNULL(orignCount,0) orignCount FROM image_config conf LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT orign,COUNT(orign) orignCount FROM ( SELECT
cd.CD001,cd.active_type ,IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CK016,"-",-1), '') AS nows,cof.name orign,co.id FROM st4_scs_cd cd LEFT JOIN image_config cof ON cof.id = cd.active_type
LEFT JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id LEFT JOIN
( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004 ) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001 ) ck ON ck.cd004 = cd.CD001 WHERE 1=1
and co.id=#{id}
GROUP BY cof.id ) t GROUP BY orign ) aa ON aa.orign = conf.name WHERE orign IS NOT NULL

SELECT IFNULL(orign,'') orign,IFNULL(orignCount,0) orignCount FROM image_config conf LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT orign,COUNT(orign) orignCount FROM ( SELECT
cd.CD001,cd.active_type ,IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CK016,"-",-1), '') AS nows,cof.name orign,co.id FROM st4_scs_cd cd LEFT JOIN image_config cof ON cof.id = cd.active_type
LEFT JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id LEFT JOIN
( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004 ) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001 ) ck ON ck.cd004 = cd.CD001 WHERE 1=1
and co.id=#{id}
GROUP BY cof.id ) t GROUP BY orign ) aa ON aa.orign = conf.name WHERE orign != ''

SELECT name,nows,IFNULL(nowsCount,0) nowsCount FROM image_config conf LEFT JOIN
( SELECT cofid,nows,COUNT(nows) nowsCount FROM ( SELECT
cd.CD001,cd.active_type ,IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CK016,"-",-1), '') AS nows,cof.name orign,co.id,cof.id cofid FROM st4_scs_cd cd LEFT JOIN image_config cof ON cof.id = cd.active_type
LEFT JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id LEFT JOIN
( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004 ) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001 ) ck ON ck.cd004 = cd.CD001 WHERE 1=1
and co.id=#{id}
GROUP BY cof.id ) t WHERE nows IS NOT NULL AND nows != '' GROUP BY nows ) aa ON aa.nows = conf.name WHERE nows IS NOT null

SELECT IFNULL(nows,'') nows ,IFNULL(nowsCount,0) nowsCount FROM image_config conf LEFT JOIN
( SELECT cofid,nows,COUNT(nows) nowsCount FROM ( SELECT
cd.CD001,cd.active_type ,IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CK016,"-",-1), '') AS nows,cof.name orign,co.id,cof.id cofid FROM st4_scs_cd cd LEFT JOIN image_config cof ON cof.id = cd.active_type
LEFT JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id LEFT JOIN
( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004 ) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001 ) ck ON ck.cd004 = cd.CD001 WHERE 1=1
and co.id=#{id}
GROUP BY cof.id ) t WHERE nows IS NOT NULL AND nows != '' GROUP BY nows ) aa ON aa.nows = conf.name WHERE nows != ''

SELECT sa.sa001, sa.sa019, IFNULL(cd.active_name,'') active_name, IFNULL(cd.CD001,'') cd001 FROM st4_sys_sa sa INNER JOIN st4_po_cd_sa cdsa ON cdsa.SA001 = sa.SA001 INNER JOIN st4_scs_cd cd ON cd.CD001 = cdsa.CD001
INNER JOIN st4_scs_cl cl ON cl.cl001 = cdsa.cl001 WHERE cdsa.sa001 IS NOT NULL AND cl.cl001 =#{id}

SELECT cd.* FROM st4_scs_cd cd INNER JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id INNER JOIN st4_po_cl_co clco ON clco.co001 = co.id INNER JOIN st4_scs_cl cl ON cl.CL001 = clco.CL001 WHERE cl.CL001 = #{cl001} AND cd.CD009 = 1

SELECT cd.* FROM st4_scs_cd cd INNER JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id INNER JOIN st4_po_cl_co clco ON clco.co001 = co.id INNER JOIN st4_scs_cl cl ON cl.CL001 = clco.CL001 WHERE cl.CL001 = #{cl001} AND cd.CD009 = 1 AND cd.CD001 NOT IN(SELECT CD001 FROM st4_po_cd_sa WHERE CL001 = #{cl001})

select cd.*,cl.* from st4_scs_cd cd left join st4_po_cd_sa cdsa on cdsa.CD001 = cd.CD001 inner join st4_sys_sa sa on sa.SA001 = cdsa.SA001 left join st4_scs_cl cl on cl.CL001=cd.CL001 WHERE cd.CD009=1 and sa.SA001=#{sa001}

select IF(COUNT(*) IS NULL, 0, COUNT(*)) AS checkNum, IFNULL(SUM(ck088=0 OR ck088 IS NULL ),0) AS uncheckNum, IFNULL(SUM(ck088=1),0) AS checkedNum, IFNULL(SUM(DATE_FORMAT(CK048,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')),0) AS todayNum FROM st4_scs_cd cd left JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004 ) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001 ) ck ON ck.CD004 = cd.CD001 LEFT JOIN rlhd_group co ON co.id = cd.group_id LEFT JOIN st4_po_cl_co clco ON clco.co001=co.id LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cl cl ON clco.CL001 = cl.CL001 WHERE cd.CD009 =1
and cl.CL001=#{cl001} group by cl.cl001

select * from st4_scs_cd where CD009=1
and CD004 = #{cd004}

-- select cd.CD001 from -- st4_scs_cd cd -- inner join rlhd_group co on cd.group_id = co.id -- inner JOIN st4_po_cl_co clco on clco.co001=co.id -- inner join st4_scs_cl cl on cl.CL001 = clco.cl001 -- where -- cd.CD009=1 and cl.CL001=#{cl001}
select cd.CD001 from st4_scs_cd cd inner join st4_po_cd_sa cdsa on cd.cd001 = cdsa.cd001 where cd.CD009=1 and cdsa.CL001=#{cl001}
SELECT * from st4_scs_cd where CD009 = 1 and image_id = #{image_id}

SELECT a.CD001, a.CD002, a.CD003, a.CD004, a.SG001, a.CL001, a.CD007, a.SD001, a.CD009, a.CD010, a.CD011, a.CD012, a.CD013, a.CD014, a.CD015, a.image_id imageId, a.active_name activeName, a.area, a.descri, a.geometry, a.group_id groupId, a.CD016, a.CD017, a.center, a.position, a.region, a.CD020, b.name activeType, COALESCE(c.name ,'')name from st4_scs_cd a LEFT JOIN image_config b on a.active_type = b.id LEFT JOIN rlhd_group c on a.group_id = c.id where a.CD009 = 1 and (c.del_flag = 1 or c.del_flag is null) and a.image_id = #{image_id}
